main event: A circular-shaped object was observed flying at a high altitude over Abadan, Iran on 16 November 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 minutes and traveled in a circular flight path., The estimated speed of the object was 100 mph., The object appeared to be more than 20 miles away., There was a sudden disappearance of the object with no trail observed., The report indicated that there was no photographic evidence of the sighting.
